Headline: Orange Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 79th/Oakley
ShortDescription: Eastbound 79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Western, 83rd, Damen, 79th, over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Oakley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Western, 83rd, Damen, 79th, over regular route: due to, street blockage near 79th/Oakley.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #111 King Drive/111th and #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Southbound Reroute near 116th/Marshfield
ShortDescription: Southbound #111 King Drive/111th and #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted due to street blockage near 116th/Marshfield

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #111 King Drive/111th buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Vincennes, 119th, Ashland and proceed to 115th: due to, street blockage near 116th/Marshfield.

Southbound #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Vincennes, 119th, Ashland over regular route due to, street blockage near 116th/Marshfield.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Westbound Reroute near Irving Park/Kimball
ShortDescription: Westbound 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Kedzie, Montrose, Kimball, Irving Park: due to street blockage near Irving Park/Kimball

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Kedzie, Montrose, Kimball, then resume their normal route at Irving Park, due to a street blockage near Irving Park/Kimball.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
